            function check_leap(y) -> logical
            set leap0 = check_leap(y)   ! the starting year (which is ans1)

            set sum = 0
            i = y+1
            do while (.true.) if (check_leap(i)) then
                    sum = sum + 366
                else
                    sum = sum + 365
                end if

                if (mod(sum,7) == 0) then
                    if ( (check_leap(i) .and. leap0) .or. (.not.check_leap(i) .and. .not.leap0) ) then
                        print *, i   ! and break
                        exit
                    end if
                end if
                i = i+1
            end do

        program main
        implicit none

        integer :: H, W, i, j, k, front, rear, ans1, year0, total, i_year, ny, nx, depth, y, x
        character(len=:), allocatable :: line_str
        character, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: A
        integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: queue
        integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: flag
        integer, dimension(4) :: dx, dy
        logical :: leap0, leap_i
        integer :: mod_result

        ! Initialize dx, dy
        dx = [1, -1, 0, 0]
        dy = [0, 0, 1, -1]

        ! Read H and W
        read(*,*) H, W

        ! Allocate A and flag
        allocate(character(len=1) :: A(H, W))
        allocate(flag(H, W))

        ! Allocate a string for reading lines
        allocate(character(len=W) :: line_str)

        ! Read grid
        do i = 1, H
            read(*, '(A)') line_str
            do j = 1, W
                A(i, j) = line_str(j:j)
            end do
        end do

        ! Allocate queue: max size H*W
        allocate(queue(H*W, 3))

        ! BFS initialization
        flag = 0
        front = 1
        rear = 0
        ans1 = 0

        ! Enqueue all '#' positions
        do i = 1, H
            do j = 1, W
                if (A(i, j) == '#') then
                    rear = rear + 1
                    queue(rear, 1) = i
                    queue(rear, 2) = j
                    queue(rear, 3) = 0
                end if
            end do
        end do

        ! If there are no '#'? then rear=0, then the while loop is skipped -> ans1 remains 0.

        ! BFS
        do while (front <= rear)
            y = queue(front, 1)
            x = queue(front, 2)
            depth = queue(front, 3)
            front = front + 1

            do k = 1, 4
                ny = y + dy(k)
                nx = x + dx(k)

                if (ny >= 1 .and. ny <= H .and. nx >= 1 .and. nx <= W) then
                    if (flag(ny, nx) == 0 .and. A(ny, nx) == '.') then
                        flag(ny, nx) = 1
                        rear = rear + 1
                        queue(rear, 1) = ny
                        queue(rear, 2) = nx
                        queue(rear, 3) = depth + 1
                        ans1 = depth + 1   ! the last depth we set is the maximum
                    end if
                end if
            end do
        end do

        year0 = ans1

        ! Third part: find next year with same calendar
        leap0 = check_leap(year0)

        total = 0
        i_year = year0 + 1
        do
            leap_i = check_leap(i_year)
            if (leap_i) then
                total = total + 366
            else
                total = total + 365
            end if

            mod_result = mod(total, 7)
            if (mod_result == 0) then
                if ((leap_i .and. leap0) .or. (.not. leap_i .and. .not. leap0)) then
                    write(*, '(I0)') i_year
                    exit
                end if
            end if
            i_year = i_year + 1
        end do

        contains

        function check_leap(y) result(leap)
            integer, intent(in) :: y
            logical :: leap
            if (mod(y,400) == 0) then
                leap = .true.
            else if (mod(y,4) == 0) then
                if (mod(y,100) /= 0) then
                    leap = .true.
                else
                    leap = .false. end if
            else
                leap = .false. end if
        end function

        end program

   Note: We must declare all variables.

   We'll use:

        program main
        implicit none

        integer :: H, W, i, j, k, front, rear, ans1, year0, total, i_year, ny, nx, depth, y, x
        character(len=:), allocatable :: line_str
        character, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: A
        integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: queue
        integer, dimension(:,:), allocatable :: flag
        integer, dimension(4) :: dx, dy
        logical :: leap0, leap_i
        integer :: mod_result

        ! Initialize dx, dy
        dx = [1, -1, 0, 0]
        dy = [0, 0, 1, -1]

        ! Read H and W
        read(*,*) H, W

        ! Allocate A and flag
        allocate(character(len=1) :: A(H, W))
        allocate(flag(H, W))

        ! Allocate a string for reading lines
        allocate(character(len=W) :: line_str)

        ! Read grid
        do i = 1, H
            read(*, '(A)') line_str
            do j = 1, W
                A(i, j) = line_str(j:j)
            end do
        end do

        ! Allocate queue: max size H*W
        allocate(queue(H*W, 3))

        ! BFS initialization
        flag = 0
        front = 1
        rear = 0
        ans1 = 0

        ! Enqueue all '#' positions
        do i = 1, H
            do j = 1, W
                if (A(i, j) == '#') then
                    rear = rear + 1
                    queue(rear, 1) = i
                    queue(rear, 2) = j
                    queue(rear, 3) = 0
                end if
            end do
        end do

        ! If there are no '#'? then rear=0, then the while loop is skipped -> ans1 remains 0.

        ! BFS
        do while (front <= rear)
            y = queue(front, 1)
            x = queue(front, 2)
            depth = queue(front, 3)
            front = front + 1

            do k = 1, 4
                ny = y + dy(k)
                nx = x + dx(k)

                if (ny >= 1 .and. ny <= H .and. nx >= 1 .and. nx <= W) then
                    if (flag(ny, nx) == 0 .and. A(ny, nx) == '.') then
                        flag(ny, nx) = 1
                        rear = rear + 1
                        queue(rear, 1) = ny
                        queue(rear, 2) = nx
                        queue(rear, 3) = depth + 1
                        ans1 = depth + 1   ! the last depth we set is the maximum
                    end if
                end if
            end do
        end do

        year0 = ans1

        ! Third part: find next year with same calendar
        leap0 = check_leap(year0)

        total = 0
        i_year = year0 + 1
        do
            leap_i = check_leap(i_year)
            if (leap_i) then
                total = total + 366
            else
                total = total + 365
            end if

            mod_result = mod(total, 7)
            if (mod_result == 0) then
                if ((leap_i .and. leap0) .or. (.not. leap_i .and. .not. leap0)) then
                    write(*, '(I0)') i_year
                    exit
                end if
            end if
            i_year = i_year + 1
        end do

        contains

        function check_leap(y) result(leap)
            integer, intent(in) :: y
            logical :: leap
            if (mod(y,400) == 0) then
                leap = .true.
            else if (mod(y,4) == 0) then
                if (mod(y,100) /= 0) then
                    leap = .true.
                else
                    leap = .false.
                end if
            else
                leap = .false.
            end if
        end function

        end program
